abstract: <jats:p>Six new species of<jats:italic>Gnorimoschema</jats:italic>Busck, 1900 are described:<jats:italic>G.pamira</jats:italic><jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Tadzhikistan),<jats:italic>G.brachyptera</jats:italic><jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Russia: Buryatia),<jats:italic>G.altaica</jats:italic><jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Russia: Altai),<jats:italic>G.tabazhok</jats:italic><jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Russia, Altai, Tuva),<jats:italic>G.yakovlevi</jats:italic><jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Russia: Altai, Buryatia),<jats:italic>G.kozlovi</jats:italic><jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Mongolia). A new synonym is established:<jats:italic>G.mikkolai</jats:italic>Povolný, 1994<jats:bold>syn. nov.</jats:bold>of<jats:italic>G.radkevichi</jats:italic>Piskunov, 1980.<jats:italic>Gnorimoschemamontanum</jats:italic>Povolný, 1966,<jats:bold>sp. rev., stat. nov.</jats:bold>is taken out from synonymy with<jats:italic>G.soffneri</jats:italic>(Riedl, 1965). An annotated check-list of the genus<jats:italic>Gnorimoschema</jats:italic>in the Palaearctic region is provided.</jats:p>
title: A review of some new or little-known species of the genus Gnorimoschema (Lepidoptera, Gelechiidae) from the Palaearctic region
